price: 58. Et Nous fîmes s’abattre sur eux une pluie (de pierres), et quelle funeste pluie pour des gens (pourtant) avertis !
arabic: وَأَمۡطَرۡنَا عَلَيۡهِم مَّطَرٗاۖ فَسَآءَ مَطَرُ ٱلۡمُنذَرِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-amṭarnā ʿalayhim maṭaran fasāa maṭaru al-mundharīna
